author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 15-year-old boy of Bethaniyapuram has complained of having been tortured and inflicted with burns by a person, hailing from Madurai, and running a chikki candy unit in Mumbai.

The police said that Ranjith (31) of Sholapur had employed the boy in his unit some 18 months back as Ranjith’s mother was known to the boy’s aunt, V. Guruvammal of Anbu Street in Bethaniyapuram.

On Friday, Ranjith had reportedly escaped from the unit and reached home to narrate his plight in the unit.

He alleged that hot oil was poured on his body, and his shoulder and hand had burn injuries.

Guruvammal had complained that the boy was not allowed to attend the funeral of his mother who had died sometime back.

The boy has been admitted to the Government Rajaji hospital. The Karimedu police have registered a case.
title: Minor boy complains of torture in Mumbai
